column1: Where is your pain the worst?
column2: In my back, above my waistline or higher (back dominant).
In my butt or legs (leg dominant).

column1: Is your pain constant? Does it ever stop, even for a moment?
column2: My pain never stops, it is always present (constant).
There are times when my pain does vanish completely (intermittent).

column1: Does your pain get worse when bending forward or backward?
column2: My pain is at its worst when bending forward.
My pain is at its worst when bending backward.
My pain feels about the same with any sort of movement.

column1: Does your pain get worse when sitting or standing?
column2: My pain is always worsened by sitting.
My pain is always worsened by standing or walking around.
